title: Virtual Reality-Based Underwater Engineering Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-focused course for pre-service teachers to design and evaluate underwater engineering pedagogy in virtual reality settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain fluid dynamics principles with over 85% accuracy using a VR-based submarine simulator
Learners can apply adaptive instructional designs based on Kolb’s experiential learning theory to three or more learning styles
Learners can design cognitive load management strategies in virtual reality environments and apply them to project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
